title: Chapter 1860 - A Stone Stele
body:
Chapter 1860 - A Stone Stele

Several months ago, word of the massacre in the ruins of the Dragon Palace spread throughout the Immortal Realm, stirring up massive waves. It was then that the general populace realized that, despite his Immortal King cultivation, Su Yi could kill Great Martial cultivators with ease. He could even fight Great Unity Stage experts!

Thus, the moment the old man with the goatee was captured, he realized who this young man was. He felt a chill in his hands and feet, and he practically broke down.

Without the slightest hesitation, the old man begged for his life. “I admit defeat! I’m willing to make amends for what I’ve done and do my utmost to cooperate with you, Your Excellency!”

The nearby Immortal Kings were flummoxed. Isn’t the high elder… a bit too spineless?

Although they didn’t know it, the old man wasn’t spineless at all. Rather, he had no other choice! This was his only hope of survival.

Every Immortal King beneath the heavens feared and dreaded Jade Firmament Immortal Palace… except for Su Yi. They were not strong enough to kill him, and threatening him was perfectly useless. After all, if threats...
